text: Kasautii Zindagii Kay was a highly rated show of Star Plus that ran from 2001 to 2008. The show had immense popularity and was Asia's first romance drama. The show had Shweta Tiwari, Cezanne Khan and Urvashi Dholakia in leads. The show won three international awards during its original run. title: Kasautii Zindagii Kay
